import Mathlib

open Matrix

-- Define the 2x2 rotation matrix R(θ) with entries [ [cos θ, -sin θ], [sin θ, cos θ] ]
def R (θ : ℝ) : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ := ![[cos θ, -sin θ], [sin θ, cos θ]]

/-- Show that R_theta = [[cos θ, -sin θ], [sin θ, cos θ]] belongs to SO(2) for every θ ∈ ℝ. -/
theorem R_theta_mem_SO2 (θ : ℝ) : R θ ∈ SO(2) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

open Matrix
open Real

-- Define the 2x2 rotation matrix R(θ) with entries [ [cos θ, -sin θ], [sin θ, cos θ] ]
def R (θ : ℝ) : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ :=
  ![ [Real.cos θ, -Real.sin θ], [Real.sin θ, Real.cos θ] ]

/-- Show that R_theta ∈ SO(2) for all θ. -/
theorem R_theta_mem_SO2 (θ : ℝ) : R θ ∈ SO(2) := by
  sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Matrix

-- Define the 2x2 rotation matrix R(θ) with entries [ [cos θ, -sin θ], [sin θ, cos θ] ]
def R (θ : ℝ) : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ :=
  fun i j =>
    if hI : i = 0 then
      if hJ : j = 0 then Real.cos θ
      else if hJ1 : j = 1 then -Real.sin θ else 0
    else
      if hI1 : i = 1 then
        if hJ : j = 0 then Real.sin θ
        else Real.cos θ
      else 0

/-- Show that R_theta ∈ SO(2) for all θ. -/
theorem R_theta_mem_SO2 (θ : ℝ) : R θ ∈ SO(2) := by
  -- proof omitted
  sorry
